snippet: The boy was hit in the leg as he played in the crowded courtyard of the Roosevelt housing project.
abstract: Police say a 3-year-old boy was shot in the leg in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, apparently caught in a crossfire as two men exchanged shots nearby; boy is in stable condition at Kings County Hospital Center.
lead_paragraph: The boy was hit in the leg as he played in the crowded courtyard of the Roosevelt housing project.

headline.seo: Boy, 3, Is Shot Amid Gunfight in Brooklyn
headline.main: Boy, 3, Is Shot in Leg in Brooklyn Gunfight
headline.print_headline: Boy, 3, Is Shot in Leg in Brooklyn Gunfight
